languages.text: "Но твой камень душ раскололся. Погибнешь — и Слаанеш пожрет тебя в тот же миг".
"But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."
languages.original_text: "Но твой камень душ раскололся. Погибнешь — и Слаанеш пожрет тебя в тот же миг".

traits.locale_text: "But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."
"But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."
"But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."
"But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."
"But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."

languages.text: “可你的灵魂石已经碎了。如果你死了，色孽会立刻将你吞噬。”
languages.original_text: "But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."

traits.locale_text: “可你的灵魂石已经碎了。如果你死了，色孽会立刻将你吞噬。”

languages.text: «Pero perdiste tu joya espiritual. Si mueres, Slaanesh te devorará al instante».
languages.original_text: "But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."

traits.locale_text: «Pero perdiste tu joya espiritual. Si mueres, Slaanesh te devorará al instante».

languages.text: 「だが、お前の魂縛石は砕け散った。命が尽きれば、スラーネッシュが瞬く間にお前を貪り食うだろう」
languages.original_text: "But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、お前の魂縛石は砕け散った。命が尽きれば、スラーネッシュが瞬く間にお前を貪り食うだろう」

languages.text: "Doch Euer Seelenstein wurde zertrümmert. Solltet Ihr sterben, wird Slaanesh Euch augenblicklich verschlingen."
languages.original_text: "But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."

traits.locale_text: "Doch Euer Seelenstein wurde zertrümmert. Solltet Ihr sterben, wird Slaanesh Euch augenblicklich verschlingen."

languages.text: « Mais votre pierre-esprit a été brisée. Si vous mourez, Slaanesh vous dévorera dans l'instant. »
languages.original_text: "But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."

traits.locale_text: « Mais votre pierre-esprit a été brisée. Si vous mourez, Slaanesh vous dévorera dans l'instant. »

languages.text: "Ama ruh taşın parçalandı. Eğer ölürsen Slaanesh seni anında tüketecek."
languages.original_text: "But your spirit stone was shattered. Should you die, Slaanesh will devour you in an instant."
